Glassomium
Copyright 2012 Piero Toffanin

Portions of this software use the Berkelium library developed by the Sirikata team.

Graphics support is provided by SFML, the Simple Fast Multimedia Library.

The example applications in the server/WebRoot/apps folder are (C) by their respective owners. If you think an application should not have been included with Glassomium, please contact the author at toffa006@d.umn.edu
